text: Horace Baldwin (18011850) was mayor of Houston, Texas in 1844. His brother-in- law, Augustus Chapman Allen, was a co-founder of Houston, Texas. ==References== Category:1798 births Category:1850 deaths Category:Burials at Glenwood Cemetery (Houston, Texas) Category:Mayors of Houston Category:19th- century American politicians Category:People from Baldwinsville, New York
title: Horace Baldwin
